name: North Stars
description: North Stars(NS) is a parabolic ballistic multiplayer online throw game with multiple roles and skills and different game modes. May you come to throw the ball?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8 64-bit Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 11
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8 64-bit Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 8 GB RAM GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection
